Author: fr0gcodes
Text: the same experiences affect me all the time too, except my mental breakdowns are more angry yelling/screaming than crying. it frustrates me so much that my mental health and lack of solid relationships are ruining my teenage years. i’m sorry you had to go through this, i know how shitty it feels.

Author: lunarexlipse21
Text: i cried over this exact same thing yesterday. it’s so sinking and it leaves you feeling so lost and isolated
